topics.body:
I have become more bitter... And yet happier. Almost as of I have gone full circle.
Or maybe because everything in my personal life is going great but my disdain is caused by my view of a certain group of other people who hold sway over something I care a great deal about.

Or maybe I have achieved full liberation from the ties that bind my emotions, and reached a transcendent stage.

Who knows... Or dares to dream!?
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
Today I learned of something interesting Lsjbot; basically nearly ten percent of wikipedia articles are written by a single data scrapping bot.  Basically what I mean by this is you know how people constantly edit wikipedia or how governments try to "creatively tell the truth" by editing information about them?  In the future all information will be done by data scrapping bots so fast that trolling will be impossible.


What I mean by this is that imagine someone on the internet trying to edit information to "creatively tell the truth":
"I'll edit wikipedia; that'll show those <insert whatever group of people here>!"
*put in bullshit information
*bots automatically delete the false information
"Hey!  Where'd my edit go?"
*tries to re-edit the information
*bots automatically delete the false information


If you're wondering why these bots are so effective is that they're essentially taking information and skimming it down.  The reason why a bot like this to censor information would be much harder to do is that the Lsjbot is not a intelligent program; in order to make a censorship bot it would require a high level Ai.  Theoretically 90% of mass information will be written by bots by 2030.

Yeah, I've heard about that storm on the news a couple days ago. It was probably the same one that brought down a plane in Taiwan. Whatever storm the Philippines get, Taiwan is likely to get as well. And being on the same fault line as Japan, whatever major earthquake Japan gets, Taiwan is going to feel it.
